dict.string: Perform all the MeeBot's servo motor moves specified inside the moves parameter at once.\ **moves**: A closure containing the servo motor rotations to be performed at the same time. This is where you use commands like `moveLeftArm()`, `moveRightLeg()` etc to move MeeBot’s body. This closure takes no parameters and has no return value. This parameter must not be NULL.
moveBody(moves:()->Void)
Tell MeeBot to move forward.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 4.
moveForward(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to move backward.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
moveBackward(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to move to the left.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.5 to 10. Default value is 2.
moveToLeft(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to move to the right.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 2.
moveToRight(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot bend its body.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
bend(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot perform a happy dance.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 10. Default value is 4.
happy(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to do a split.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
split(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to skip.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
skip(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to twist its hands and body.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
twist(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to step forward and shake its hand.\ **beats**:The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 5.
stepAndShake(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to bend and twist its body.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
bendAndTwist(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to shake its body.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
shake(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to wave its hand.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1 to 40. Default value is 4.
wave(beats:Double)
Tell MeeBot to swagger.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1.25 to 50. Default value is 5.
swagger(beats:Double)
Set MeeBot to the initial posture, all its joints angle would be zero
reset()
Tell MeeBot to raise its hands.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1.25 to 50. Default value is 5.
raiseHands(beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's left arm servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -110 to 75 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the left arm servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 1.
moveLeftArm(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's right arm servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -75 to 110 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the right arm servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1.25 to 50. Default value is 5.
moveRightArm(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's left leg servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -45 to 45 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the left leg servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 1.
moveLeftLeg(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's right leg servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -45 to 45 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the right leg servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 1.25 to 50. Default value is 5.
moveRightLeg(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's left foot servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -65 to 75 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the left foot servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 1.
moveLeftFoot(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Rotate MeeBot's right foot servo motor to specified angle.\ **angle**: A Double value in the range -65 to 75 specifying the angle of rotation, in degrees, for the right foot servo motor.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 1.
moveRightFoot(angle:Int, beats:Double)

Perform all the MeeBot's servo motor moves specified inside the moves parameter at once.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 0.25 to 20. Default value is 1.\ **moves**: A closure containing the servo motor rotations to be performed at the same time. This is where you use commands like `moveLeftArm()`, `moveRightLeg()` etc to move MeeBot’s body. This closure takes no parameters and has no return value. This parameter must not be NULL.
moveBody(beats:Double, moves:()->Void)
Set the BPM of your own song. This function accept an Integer in the range 30 to 500.
setBpmOfMySong(bpm:UInt)
Tell MeeBot to perform some crazy dance moves.\ **beats**: The total duration of the moves, measured in beats. The value of this parameter is a Double in the range 5 to 200. Default value is 10.
crasyDance(beats:Double)
